Package tellosimulator.view.world

Class SimulatorCamera

  • java.lang.Object
    • javafx.scene.Node
      • javafx.scene.Camera
        • javafx.scene.PerspectiveCamera
          • tellosimulator.view.world.SimulatorCamera
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget
    public class SimulatorCamera
extends javafx.scene.PerspectiveCamera
    The PerspectiveCamera in the 3D-Scene. Position is bound to the DroneView. Pivot and zoom is controllable by the user (MouseEvents for rotating and moving the camera are handled on the Simulator3DScene).
    See Also:
    DroneView, Simulator3DScene
